text: The flag of Belo Horizonte () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. In 2024, a new flag was suggested, but the people in Belo Horizonte rejected it. ==Related pages== * Belo Horizonte ==References== Belo Horizonte Category:Flags with coats of arms Belo Horizonte
title: Flag of Belo Horizonte
